:py:mod:`serverinfo`
====================

.. py:module:: serverinfo


Module Contents
---------------

Classes
~~~~~~~

.. autoapisummary::

   serverinfo.Info



Functions
~~~~~~~~~

.. autoapisummary::

   serverinfo.setup



.. py:class:: Info(bot)

   Bases: :py:obj:`discord.ext.commands.Cog`

   The base class that all cogs must inherit from.

   A cog is a collection of commands, listeners, and optional state to
   help group commands together. More information on them can be found on
   the :ref:`ext_commands_cogs` page.

   When inheriting from this class, the options shown in :class:`CogMeta`
   are equally valid here.

   .. py:method:: display_emoji(self)
      :property:


   .. py:method:: avatar(self, ctx, *, user = None)
      :async:

      Get the avatar of you or someone else


   .. py:method:: joinedat(self, ctx, *, user = None)
      :async:

      Check when a user joined the current server


   .. py:method:: server(self, ctx)
      :async:

      Check info about current server


   .. py:method:: server_icon(self, ctx)
      :async:

      Get the current server icon


   .. py:method:: server_banner(self, ctx)
      :async:

      Get the current banner image


   .. py:method:: user(self, ctx, *, user = None)
      :async:

      Get user information



.. py:function:: setup(bot)
   :async:
